Articles.Content: When you attach a stack-decoupler to the stock heat-shield you get this awful looking fairing to cover the sides of the heat-shield. Anybody feel up to trying to re-texture or maybe even remodel the thing? I cannot stand it any longer.

Ven's Stock Revamp revamps the heatshield (along with most other stock parts) and also gives it and its fairing a better texture and the fairing model is completely flush with the other tanks. I guess you can delete all the parts except the heatshields if you don't want your other parts to be changed.
